de.ddkfm.util.transform

Class Transformator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ddkfm.util.transform.Transformator

  • public class Transformator
extends java.lang.Object
    The Transformator transforms a given Data as MicroData OR as XML OR as JSON (not implemented yet) and also load this data by the named formats
